Answers to Your Questions

 

 

Who are you?

MicroWeb Tech is a Digital Agency in Nigeria that creates simple efficient digital solutions for businesses  looking to leverage the power of technology to grow their business.

With 5 years of active experience in the digital space, you can rest assured that we know exactly how to spin the wheels to get desired results.

What you’d love about us is our obsession to always go the extra mile for you, and that is because we believe that our job is not complete until you can remember your experience with us and smile.

How can I contact you?

Phone/WhatsApp: (+234) 815 815 2233
Email: hello@microwebstech.com

 

I'm a product based business; what if you don't meet the sales target on the package?

The sales target for each package was fixed after considering the average sales we’ve made for product based businesses in the past. The sales target is not specific because when it comes to sponsored ads, you cannot accurately determine the exact sales you will make. That’s why we set a range, and we do everything possible to fall within the range. In some cases, we can even surpass the target.

Because of our experience and expertise, it is quite unlikely that we will fall below the target, but in the very unlikely event that that happens, we will extend the period of your ad campaign to hit your target, at no extra cost to you.

 

I'm a service based business; what if you don't get the target leads on the package?

The target leads for each package was fixed after considering the average leads we’ve generated for service based businesses in the past. The target leads are not specific because when it comes to sponsored ads, you cannot accurately determine the exact leads you will generate from a campaign. That’s why we set a range, and we do everything possible to fall within the range. In some cases, we can even surpass the target.

Because of our experience and expertise, it is quite unlikely that we will fall below the target, but in the very unlikely event that that happens, we will extend the period of your ad campaign to hit your target, at no extra cost to you.

 

I'm a service based business; what does leads mean?

Leads are people who indicate interest in your product/service. The more leads you have, the more sales you’re likely to make.

We spend a lot of time researching your target audience, that way we target only people who would be interested in your service/product, and are able to afford them

 

Some clients we've worked with
